author: "Llull, Ramon, 1232?-1316"
title: "Raimvndi Lvlii Maiorici, philosophi acutissimi, mediciq[ue] celeberrimi, De secretis natur¾, siue quinta essentia libri duo. His accesserunt, Alberti Magni, summi philosophi, de mineralibus et rebus metallicis libri quinque / Qu¾ omnia solerti cura repurg"
